Blacknightmare:

"I'm the third in command" replied Blacknightmare "And while master 
is out his base, I have to be sure that nobody destroy his base; I 
have to do that and have all things ready to his next plans too... 
and his next plans are destroy the faction who attacked us some days 
ago... Exist a way to capture a base without damages?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     "You're the boss.  I'll plan the battle but you have to tell me 
who, 
> what, and with whom I'm attacking."
